document.full_text: hospitals in bahrain, where the government has cracked down on protests and imposed martial law, have become places to be feared where wounds can identify people for arrest, a medical charity said thursday.
document.title: fear stalks bahrain hospitals: medical charity
lines_and_colors: hospitals in bahrain, where the government has cracked down on protests and imposed martial law, have become places to be feared where wounds can identify people for arrest, a medical charity said thursday.
